ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_02_10:
In for another training session with me today?
Let’s see what we can make of it!
ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio is so unusual and exciting!
ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_02_10:
The world is beyond anything I ever
imagined, let me tell you.
ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_04_10:
Compared to the size of the world,
we’re both little tykes, eh, kid?
ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_01_10:
There’s got to be so many Electric-type Pokémon
in this world that I’ve never seen before!
ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_02_10:
Just thinking about it makes me very, very, very,
very, very, very...
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_01_10:
Between you and me, kid, I’m a huge fan
of the Pokémon Pikachu.
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s a world-famous Pokémon, and, well,
I’m in love with it, too!
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_03_10:
Just thinking about its adorable little face...
It’s so good! ...Huh?
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_04_10:
Oh, of course I love Raichu, too!
It’s really cute—but it packs a punch, too!
It’s perfect!
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_01_10:
I’m looking forward to meeting lots of
Trainers with their Pikachu and Raichu here
on Pasio, too.
ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_02_10: If you see one, report it to me—on the double!
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_01_10:
Want to hear a story from me?
Well, I used to have a Voltorb that was actually
quite a coward. Disappointing, right?
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_02_10:
You’d be surprised, though. Just because it
was easily scared didn’t make it weak.
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_03_10:
My cowardly Voltorb would always notice
even little dangers and hazards!
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_04_10:
In fact, that’s how I got my reputation as a
super-cautious electric soldier!
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_01_10:
Even things that might seem like a
disappointment can turn out to be really good.
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_02_10:
It’s all about variety—about how everyone’s
different. Trust me on that.
ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_03_10:
One of the reasons why I train my Pokémon so
hard is because I want to make sure I strengthen
their good points!
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_01_10:
I have plenty of treasures—things I would
never want to lose!
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_02_10: I train hard so that I can protect my treasures!
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_03_10:
In fact, I became a Pokémon Trainer to better
protect my treasures!
It’s important to never forget your roots.
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_04_10:
I’m not afraid to set traps or install multiple
locks for my room!
It doesn’t matter if people call me a coward!
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, you’ve got to ask yourself,
what is today for?
ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s something you and I have to keep
asking ourselves, every day!
ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, you ain’t bad, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’re a good kid.
ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_02_10:
I want things to turn out well for you.
Really, really well!
ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_03_10:
So, a word of advice: Enjoy your time with
your Pokémon! Have lots of battles—and
most importantly, make lots of friends!
ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ve come across lots of different treasures.
The variety is shocking!
ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_02_10:
If you can gather a huge number of treasures—
and keep them safe—that’s proof that your
strength is the real deal!
ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon knocked over a trash can and...
Surprise!
ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_02_10: It had a little gift—perfect for you, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_01_10:
Ha ha, I’m joking about the trash can bit, kid!
Did you take me seriously there?
ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_02_10:
Sorry, sorry! I’ll give you more presents
now and then—give me a break!
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_01_10:
Your Pokémon battles are fantastic, kid!
Absolutely electrifying!
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_02_10:
It feels good when you’re doing well
and enjoying your battles.
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_03_10:
But it’s important to not let your guard down—
especially when you’re on a roll!
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s very dangerous to lose focus during
Pokémon battles!
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_01_10:
The most important thing for victory
is caution!
ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_02_10:
Whether on the battlefield or in Pokémon battles,
caution will save the day!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are something that both adults
and children can get passionate about!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_02_10:
No matter where I go in the world, Trainers are
always battling each other!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s definitely a lot of fun, but you can’t do
it without love for your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_04_10: Pokémon aren’t just tools for battle, after all!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_01_10: I think you can show the world, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_02_10:
Show everyone that you can become happy by
forming a strong bond with your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! Good Pokémon Trainers should be up
and ready at the crack o’ dawn!
ch0035_00_matthies/3002_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! I’m just going for my daily run.
It’s the best way to stay fit!
ch0035_00_matthies/3003_0701_01_10:
Ten-hut! How’s your energy, kid?
I’m always fully charged!
ch0035_00_matthies/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey! How’s it goin’, kid?
Better not be slackin’ off!
ch0035_00_matthies/3005_0701_01_10:
I don’t care if it gets dark. My Pokémon can
light a spark anywhere, no sweat.
ch0035_00_matthies/3006_0701_01_10:
Evenin’! I’d love to hit the rack,
but my Pokémon keep zapping me.
